source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
	[Document No_],
      [Line No_] ,
      [Type],
      [No_]
      [Sell-to Customer No_],
      [Location Code],
      [Description],
      [Unit of Measure], 
      [Quantity],
      [Unit Price],
      [Unit Cost (LCY)],
      [Shortcut Dimension 1 Code],
      [Shortcut Dimension 2 Code],
      [Quantity (Base)],
      [Item Category Code],
      [Free Supply],
      [GST Group Code],
      [Total GST Amount],
      [Scheme Reason],
      [Scheme Code],
      [Pack title],
      [Scheme Parent Item No_],
      [ECOM],
      [Last Modified On],
      [Posting Date],
	'AP' as Site_Code
FROM [dbo].[BIPL - ANDHRA PRADESH$Sales Shipment Line]
where year([Posting Date]) >= 20 and year([Posting Date]) < 2021
UNION ALL
SELECT 
	[Document No_],
      [Line No_] ,
      [Type],
      [No_]
      [Sell-to Customer No_],
      [Location Code],
      [Description],

      [Quantity],
      [Unit Price],
      [Unit Cost (LCY)],
      [Shortcut Dimension 1 Code],
      [Shortcut Dimension 2 Code],
      [Quantity (Base)],
      [Item Category Code],
      [Free Supply],
      [GST Group Code],

      [Scheme Reason],

      [Last Modified On],
